name: Onion Knights Lodge
description: A Onion Knight theme tavern. If you're weary or battle worn, come seek out the Onion Sworn.
Onion Knights (blue or black helms) eat and drink free!

name: Moist Manor
description: Looking to play out your most realistic RP experiences? Want to just dance? Looking for rentable designer rooms? We've got everything to wet your taste buds~

name: The Moist Tip
description: This evening, enter our walls and open wide for the ♥️  ❖【The Moist Tip】❖ ♥️ !!

The [18+] HOTTEST PINK and POPPIN' nightclub venue on Gilgamesh that's so moist, it'll leave you DRIPPING in GIL and DANK DRINKS! Slip into our judgment-free, welcoming to all humble abode and treat yourself to a fully loaded bar, gambling, and dancing!

name: Spicy Lanterns
description: We are a new Othardian theme fusion restaurant offering our guests the most immersive dining experience as well as the best tasting dishes around! Each dish comes with its own unique tabletop item for that extra immersiveness, and food role play is strongly encouraged here!
We also house an open stage so we welcome all bards to play their tunes for us~

name: Bar Minstrel
description: Inspired by the Tokyo bar scene, this small but ambient back alley venue is sure to delight couples, wanderers, and bar-crawlers! Our drinks are inspired from izakayas from Omoide Yokochō, Roppongi, and Shinjuku. We boast one of the few Lalafell accessible bars in Jenova so you'll find yourself delighting in appropriately sized furnishings!

name: Miss Dawn's Maid Cafe and Spa
description: A nice cozy spot of eorzea. we can give you hugs, headpats, kisses, and drinks. all your cute dreams might be able to come true here. whether it be hot tub parties, or cute little dates. we might be able to serve you just right. love ya~

name: Red Star
description: Welcome to Red Star Sushi & Seafood, Modern, Dim Lit Far Eastern Apartment, Open Stage & Hot tubs. Enjoy!

name: Moonlight's Cafe
description: Cozy cafe with nice coffee to warm you up and a delicious sandwich to go with it, Come in and enjoy the music and vibes of the cafe.

name: The Dawn Tavern
description: I am a tavern in a small house that is AFK friendly, LGBTQ+ friendly and I try to go for a cozy environment.

name: Narnes & Boble
description: A cozy, immersive bookstore and cafe.

name: Whitewillow Café
description: Whitewillow is a cozy basement cafe hidden away underneath a small tavern.

Enjoy a hot drink while you read in our private library, or turn your attention to the open stage as you feast on a good meal. We're open late nights for those of you seeking a place to wind down after a hard day's work, and middays for those of you wanting a quick refresher in between quests.

name: Copycat Records Cafe
description: A small café on Adamantoise with live vinyl records streamed as entertainment. The Cafe is music oriented, with a relaxing and laid back atmosphere. The venue is RP and AFK friendly, whether people want to come in and meet new friends, or if they wanna come in just vibe out to music, all is welcome!

name: The Boar & Dragon
description: Part of Kugane and Ishgards cultural exchange! A shrine to Tatsugami watched over by the Lords of the Boar! Tatsugami is the dragon god of relaxation and indulgence. The Lords of the Boar are a group of knights that follow the way of the Boar, live free and ferociously!

name: Marigold
description: ♥ The Marigold is a restaurant and flower shop in one ♥
It's the best place for high-qaulity popoto based food!
Plus, all those beautiful flowers and corsages ♥

name: The Cupboard: Tea Room & Parlor
description: Offering comforting refreshments with cozy surrounds for conversation aplenty - our menu changes for each week's open hours, so be sure to see if your favorites are featured this time around.
With periodic events, weekly open hours, and rental and hosting services available, we hope you find whatever it is you're looking for in a corner of The Cupboard.

name: Restorative Therapy
description: Healing starts here
Restorative therapy aims to help warriors of light overcome their struggles to build a better future for themselves and those around them.

name: Momma Luca's
description: A LGBTQIA+ friendly café in the cold winter of the Empyreum, our focus is warming you up, body and soul, with warm drinks, sweet desserts, and friendly service. Allow us to become your family away from family, and bring a little joy to a cold winters night. We have raffles on the first of every month, photography services, crafting services, live entertainment, and giveaways, and are always looking for guest suggestions towards greater expansion!

name: The Kat's Meow
description: The Kat's Meow is now open, and ready to offer our services to people looking for... something more in life. Guidance, long lost information, or maybe even a helping hand in finding your path, we will do our best to help you find what you need, like:
- Our library of books and tomes features tons of information, stories, legends, and countless other things that will be sure to satisfy your needs.
- Our divination services will help you find answers and advice to all your biggest wonders and worries.
- Our potions and tinctures will help you achieve whatever it is you will, and provide the right tincture for the right ailment or need.
- Our trinkets, lockets, sigils, and spell jars can be made for any need, unless morally objectionable.
- Our homemade teas and treats are a wonderful way to treat your self after a long day of adventuring.
(Disclaimer: All items are RP only, we don't actually trade items or accept actual gil, except for tips if you enjoy our services.)

name: Kittenz
description: Welcome to Kittenz Striple Club, and yes, it is exactly what you think it is. We offer a variety of fun options from our menu, delicious drinks, and of course our signature Striple Triad. Relax in a fun and NSFW focused environment to chase away the night!
Established: Jan 15, 2021

name: The King of Cups
description: A pop-up tea & tarot cafe offering a custom menu and in character tarot readings.

name: The Odder Path
description: The Odder path is a free venue meant to feel like a mid range price restaurant, not apple bees quality, but not fine dining either. Like a place people would have a nice birthday dinner in because it's better than apple bees but it's not so expensive that it would break their bank. Services at the moment include dining in the lower floor, and a small bar near the entrance of the plot, but eventually once I get more funds I eventually plan on getting a bard to play music.

name: Affluence
description: Tell me, have you been to Affluence? The fabled golden bungirls? The sacred Viera of the luxury club scene? Do you know aught of its present state of affairs? ...I thought not. Even of your little Eorzea, you know precious little. All of which is to say: expand your horizons. Go forth and seek discovery. As the bearer of Azem's crystal, you may consider your duty to see at least that much.

name: The SNEK Den
description: A rogue's based tavern focused on adventure RP and character lore and story.

name: Rhotano Vale
description: A colorful cafe at the edge of a chilly Ishgard, Rhotano Vale is meant to create warm memories and comfortable vibes. ...With a side-helping of antics, of course.

name: SONG Lounge
description: Welcome to SONG Lounge! We have live DJs, colorful cocktails, immersive hosts, top-tier gambling, and relaxing tubs! Jump in the elevator to be brought into our one-of-a-kind lounge.

name: The Evil Eye
description: The Evil Eye is a cultish speakeasy where members and guests from all over come over to worship our ancient deity! With our luxurious rust covered benches and floors, anybody with their right mind would sit and relax here with their friends and family! Joining together to dance, drink, or gamble the night away, The Evil Eye has a wide variety of services to fulfill anybody's needs!

name: Golden Age
description: Escape from the drama of daily life, and immerse yourself in a golden age of luxury. Enjoy the thrill of gambling in our dealer room, or explore our legendary club downstairs. Golden Age offers a wide variety of services for the discerning patron.

name: The Hingashi Underground
description: Come drink your night away in this shady bar tucked away in the back alleys of Kugane. The Hingashi Underground is a place for free spirits and indecorous behaviour, and promises to keep you entertained with a relaxed roleplaying experience.
This grunge-themed venue is host to a variety of amenities including a stocked bar, triple triad matches and rock-genre bard music.

name: The Tom Cat
description: The Tom Cat is proud to serve as the best little gay club in all Eorzea. We are LGBTIA+ friendly and offer a range of services including themed refreshments, raffles and giveaways, live Bard and DJ entertainment and Court companionship.

name: Lune Cafe
description: An Ishgardian Cafe nestled in the newly restored Empyreum. Featuring Comforting and Hearty Foods, Maids, Butlers, a Bard, Fortune Teller, and Portrait Sketch Artist. Our goal is to give our guests a comfy (SFW) experience.
notices: This venue is open every first Friday of the month. 9PM to 12AM EST

name: The Red Hideout
description: Little social bar venue within an FC house, very light on RP but it is welcomed
location: Gilgamesh, Lavender Beds, Ward 24, Plot 28, Room 55

name: Lohcho Lounge
description: Cozy tavern feel, friendly conversations and an open stage
notices: This venue is often open in the evenings (Eastern Time). Check Party Finder.

name: The Gold Roller
description: The Gold Roller would like to welcome you to a premium casino and club experience! Our casino floor offers a variety of games such as slot dice, roulette, and blackjack. We also host a High Roller Bar for those who enjoy the finer things in life!
Join us on our lower floor for a night of dancing, tarot, our Rainbow Bar and our resident DJ.
Other services include: Photography, Courtesans, Personal Dances, High Roller Club Membership, In House Bard Band!

name: The Killing Floor
description: The Killing Floor, a non-profit Goth / Metal nigthclub that is centered around the guest experience and 'having a blast' every night that they're open.

name: The Wolfs Respite
description: We at the wolfs respite to give you a nice late night place to kick off your shoes relax and unwind from your crazy adventures saving the world as as know.

We also have an extensive an library; you are free to grab a book do some research or just read a steamy romance. If we do not happen to have a book you want please feel free to let us know and we will do our best to have it for you on your next visit.

name: The Sleepy Knight
description: I’m a small diner that offers a relaxing atmosphere. If I have the music unlocked I’ll gladly change it to it. I’m a wandering knight so my diner is reflected in my journeys.

name: Cenote Wyvern
description: Cenote Wyvern is an SFW RP and social venue/community focused on encouraging genuine connections between players and/or characters. At are venue we offer a free bar, a wide variety of music between our Lofi bot, house bot, and house DJ, and we have community specialists always looking to engage with our guests to ensure they have the best social experience and encourage them to escape their comfort zone and interact with another guest. For all intents and purposes, we are a non-profit venue outside of our small-scale gambling options for RP in amounts no greater than 50k. We do NOT do Raffles, Giveaways, or large-scale gambling, as we believe these opportunities detract from social experiences between guests.
